description: Thank you for playing the Beta Version of BerryHunter!

changes.description: Everything placed in the map by players can also be destroyed by players.
It's now possible to start crafts while walking.
Crafting could get stuck before it even started, requiring the player to re-join the game.
Scores are used to show high scores and top 10 leaderboards across 4 time periods.
The tutorial will not be displayed automatically anymore but instead players can choose to enable it.
Players can start the game now in full screen mode.
Start screen got a new and improved layout.
Multiple icons have been reworked: stone, bronze, iron, titanium.
All our social media accounts are linked on both start and end screen.
Attack and hit animations have been reworked. There are now both swings and stabs.
Player can rate their game experience at the end of each game.
Most graphics have been improved with shadows.
Ground textures have been redesigned and reworked.
Damage, freezing and starving overlays have been reworked.
We got a new logo!
A warning is now shown when you try to navigate away from an active game.
Credits for used resources are shown.
Chat messages and crafting progress could get stuck when a player died.
Inventory size increased to 9.
Visibility of chat messages, especially during the night.
Tutorial visibility and wording.
Mobs show when they are damaged. Players show both damage and freezing.
